verses.text: Ha ex mach ex tzeyak'och Dios Ek'to t'a Yib'anh Smasanil yipoc e k'ool, tanhvab'il ex yuj, aton Dios Masanil syal yuj.
Ol eyal icha tik: Ach Jehová, a t'ayach wach' co colan co b'a, a ach tzach och quenhuloc, co Diosal ach, yip co k'ol aji, xe chama.
Anhejton Dios chi' ol onh colanel t'a yaal k'ub'eltac yajemi yet' t'a ilya ed'jinac chamel.
Ol onh moyjocq'ue yuj, ichato ay sk'axil, malaj tas ol onh ik'anoc. Yujto syaq'uelk'och sti', ha' ol onh colanoc, icha tz'aj scolchaj junok anima yuj smaclab' jul-lab'.
Manh ol onh xivlaj t'a junok tas ay smay tzek' t'ak'walil. Manh ol onh xivpaxlaj t'a jul-lab' sjulchaj t'a k'ualil.
Manh ol onh xivlaj t'a ilya sja t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal. Manh ol onh xivpaxlaj t'a tas tz'ak'an lajvoquel anima t'a k'ualil.
Mil anima ol cham t'a co q'uexanh. Lajunhe' mil t'a co wach', a onhxo jun, malaj tas ol onh ik'anoc.
Anhej to ol quila' tas spac ol scha eb' sk'ulan chukal.
Yujto ix co col co b'ha t'a Jehová Ek'to t'a Yib'anh Smasanil, ha' ix cak'och yipoc co k'ool,
yuj chi' manh ol schacot chukal t'a quib'anh, manh ol k'ochlaj ilya t'a co pat.
Ol yal t'a eb' yángel to tzonh stanhvej eb' yalnhej b'aj tzonh b'ati.
Ol onh quetzchajq'ue yuj eb', yic wach' manh ol co tenoch coc t'a q'uen q'ueen.
Ol yal co b'eyek' t'a skal nok' choj, ma t'a skal nok' chan. Wach'chom te ov nok' chan chi', ma te nivac nok' choj chi', palta malaj tas ol onh ik'anoc.
Yalnaccan Jehová t'ayonh: Ol ex in colo' yujto tzin e xajanej. Ichato ol in och eyenhuloc, yujto tzin eyal e Yajaloc.
Ayic ol in eyavtani, ol in tak'voc t'ayex. Ha in ol in cajnaj eyed'oc, ol ex in colanel t'a syaelal, ol ex vik'anchaanh.
Nivan e q'uinal ol vak'a'. Ol vak' eyil in colval, xchi Dios.
